name: surrogateKey
description: Surrogate key for the activity (defined by activity ID)

name: activityID
description: Unique identifier for the activity summary

name: createdOn
description: Timestamp when the activity was created

name: createdAt
description: Timestamp when the activity was created

name: planID
description: ID of the associated workout plan

name: userID
description: ID of the user who performed the activity

name: weekOfPlan
description: Week of the plan when the activity occurred (optional)

name: currentEst5kTimeInSecs
description: Estimated 5K Time at time of activity
